item.title: Educating the ruling class at ses chicago 2012
item.description: This was a presentation I put on at SES Chicago helping spread the message that SEO and social for the sake of SEO and Social is pointless. It has to be part of something larger.
item.content:encoded: This was a presentation I put on at SES Chicago helping spread the message that SEO and social for the sake of SEO and Social is pointless. It has to be part of something larger.

item.title: A branded visual content theorem
item.description: The use of images has greatly increased in the world of social media. Why are they so powerful and how can you best use them for your purposes? conceptbakery is trying to shed some light into the conversation...

item.title: Gapingvoid: I'm Not Delusional, I'm An Entrepreneur
item.description: Gapingvoid’s unique style of visual communication has long been popular among successful and aspiring entrepreneurs. They decorate their offices with prints of gapingvoid art. They wear our t-shirts. They read our blog and newsletter. We admire and appreciate all entrepreneurs - they are the future - and we salute them (and you) with this short look at entrepreneurship told through a series of cartoons.
item.content:encoded: Gapingvoid’s unique style of visual communication has long been popular among successful and aspiring entrepreneurs. They decorate their offices with prints of gapingvoid art. They wear our t-shirts. They read our blog and newsletter. We admire and appreciate all entrepreneurs - they are the future - and we salute them (and you) with this short look at entrepreneurship told through a series of cartoons.

item.title: Who says startups are easy
item.description: Today with the increased competition and attention diffusion, it is becoming much harder to be a consumer web startups. And in order to win, the founders need to make all the right bets, all the time, or else they will find themselves on road to nowhere.
item.content:encoded: Today with the increased competition and attention diffusion, it is becoming much harder to be a consumer web startups. And in order to win, the founders need to make all the right bets, all the time, or else they will find themselves on road to nowhere.

item.title: Digital Strategy Toolbox
item.description: Pay with a tweet to download this presentation - http://www.paywithatweet.com/pay/?id=5915a9492d1cc5748b6909961a8a45d3 Here are 17 of the best free online tools for Digital Strategists to help cultivate killer insights on consumers, competitors and the industry. In this toolbox we you will find how to use each tool with an example insight drawn for the client, as well as each of their benefits and limitations. The tools helps to conduct Consumer Research, Category Research, Discourse Analysis and Environmental analysis.
item.content:encoded: Pay with a tweet to download this presentation - http://www.paywithatweet.com/pay/?id=5915a9492d1cc5748b6909961a8a45d3 Here are 17 of the best free online tools for Digital Strategists to help cultivate killer insights on consumers, competitors and the industry. item.title: Israel's Social War: Strategy & Tactics
item.description: A short presentation exploring how Israel’s Defense Forces are fighting their war in Gaza using social media strategy. From hot Israeli soldiers on Instagram to war infographics on Facebook, we quickly survey the IDF’s social excellence.
item.content:encoded: A short presentation exploring how Israel’s Defense Forces are fighting their war in Gaza using social media strategy. From hot Israeli soldiers on Instagram to war infographics on Facebook, we quickly survey the IDF’s social excellence.

item.title: Email Marketing GANGNAM Style from BrandMail.com.au - Are You Ready?
item.description: Psy has led the way for several weeks now with his Horsey style dance. Good on him. After studying Psy and his success at great length we discovered some amazing coincidences (or were they) between Psy and Email marketing. Needless to say, the attached presentation is testament to that. We are sure you will get something out of this, even if its just a wry smile.
